LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease having initial or remaining lease term in excess of one year to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.label: Letters of Credit Outstanding, Amount
LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.description: The total amount of the contingent obligation under letters of credit outstanding as of the reporting date.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LiabilitiesCurrent.label: Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LongLivedAssetsHeldForSaleGainLossOnSale.label: Long Lived Assets Held-for-sale, Gain (Loss) on Sale (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
LongLivedAssetsHeldForSaleGainLossOnSale.description: The difference between the proceeds received and the carrying value of the long-lived asset. If the proceeds received exceeds the carrying value of the long-lived asset, then there is a gain. If the proceeds received is less than the carrying value of the long-lived asset, then there is a loss.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermInvestments.label: Long-term Investments
LongTermInvestments.description: The total amount of investments that are intended to be held for an extended period of time (longer than one operating cycle).

LongTermLineOfCredit.label: Long-term Line of Credit, Noncurrent
LongTermLineOfCredit.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the noncurrent portion of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValuePerio.label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Period Increase (Decrease)
LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValuePerio.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in loss contingency liability.

LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueProvi.label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Carrying Value, Provision (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueProvi.description: The charge against earnings in the period to increase loss contingency liabilities, net of any adjustments to reduce previously estimated charges.

LossContingencyAccrualProvision.label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Provision
LossContingencyAccrualProvision.description: Amount charged against operating income increasing loss contingency liability, after adjustments to reduce previously estimated charges.

LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.label: Loss Contingency, Estimate of Possible Loss
LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.description: Reflects the estimated amount of loss from the specified contingency as of the balance sheet date.

LossContingencyNewClaimsFiledNumber.label: Loss Contingency, New Claims Filed, Number
LossContingencyNewClaimsFiledNumber.description: The total number of new claims filed pertaining to a loss contingency during the period.

MarketableSecurities.label: Marketable Securities
MarketableSecurities.description: Amount of investment in marketable security.

MarketingExpense.label: Marketing Expense
MarketingExpense.description: Expenditures for planning and executing the conception, pricing, promotion, and distribution of ideas, goods, and services. Costs of public relations and corporate promotions are typically considered to be marketing costs.

MaterialsSuppliesAndOther.label: Materials, Supplies, and Other
MaterialsSuppliesAndOther.description: The carrying amount of capitalized costs of materials, supplies, and other assets, which are not included in inventory but used in production.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.label: Net Increase (Decrease) in Sales and Transfer Prices and Production Costs
NetIncreaseDecreaseInSalesAndTransferPri.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of change in sales and transfer prices and in production (lifting) costs related to future production.

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

NumberOfStatesInWhichEntityOperates.label: Number of States in which Entity Operates
NumberOfStatesInWhichEntityOperates.description: The number of states the entity operates in as of the balance sheet date.

OilAndGasProductionExpense.label: Oil and Gas Production Expense (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OilAndGasProductionExpense.description: Costs incurred to operate and maintain an entities' wells and related equipment and facilities, including depreciation and applicable operating costs of support equipment and facilities and other costs of operating and maintaining those wells and related equipment and facilities.

OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodG.label: Oil and Gas Property, Successful Effort Method, Gross
OilAndGasPropertySuccessfulEffortMethodG.description: Oil and Gas properties, gross, carried under the successful effort method.

OilAndGasRevenue.label: Oil and Gas Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OilAndGasRevenue.description: Aggregate revenue during the period related to oil and gas business activities.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeaseCost.label: Operating Lease, Cost
OperatingLeaseCost.description: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Remainder of Fiscal Year
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

OtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

OtherInvestments.label: Other Investments
OtherInvestments.description: Amount of investments classified as other.

OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Current
OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
OtherOperatingActivitiesCashFlowStatemen.description: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabili.label: Payment for Contingent Consideration Liability, Financing Activities
PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabili.description: Amount of cash outflow, not made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability up to amount recognized at acquisition date, including, but not limited to, measurement period adjustment and less amount paid soon after acquisition date.

PaymentsForProceedsFromInvestments.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Investments
PaymentsForProceedsFromInvestments.description: The net cash paid (received) associated with the acquisition or disposal of all investments, including securities and other assets.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireInterestInSubsidiariesA.label: Payments to Acquire Interest in Subsidiaries and Affiliates
PaymentsToAcquireInterestInSubsidiariesA.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of or advances to an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, and joint venture or equity method investment) or the acquisition of an additional interest in a subsidiary (controlled entity).

PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.label: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.

PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PaymentsToAcquireShortTermInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Short-term Investments
PaymentsToAcquireShortTermInvestments.description: The cash outflow for securities or other assets acquired, which qualify for treatment as an investing activity and are to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets, Current
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Current
PrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidInsurance.label: Prepaid Insurance
PrepaidInsurance.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for insurance that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidRent.label: Prepaid Rent
PrepaidRent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for rent that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.

ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.label: Proceeds from Income Tax Refunds
ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.description: The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Marketable Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.description: The cash inflow associated with the aggregate amount received by the entity through sale or maturity of marketable securities (held-to-maturity or available-for-sale) during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.description: Cash received for the sale of real estate that is not part of an investing activity during the current period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfShortTermInvestments.label: Proceeds from Sale of Short-term Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfShortTermInvestments.description: The cash inflow from sales of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Additions
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.description: Amount of acquisition of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization from plant, property, and equipment and right-of-use asset from finance lease.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount, after accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, before Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentTransfersAndCha.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Transfers and Changes
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentTransfersAndCha.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale, from reclassification, impairment, donation, or changes classified as other. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

PurchaseObligation.label: Purchase Obligation
PurchaseObligation.description: Minimum amount of purchase arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from a supplier.

PurchaseObligationDueInFourthYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Four
PurchaseObligationDueInFourthYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInNextTwelveMonths.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year One
PurchaseObligationDueInNextTwelveMonths.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInSecondYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Two
PurchaseObligationDueInSecondYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

PurchaseObligationDueInThirdYear.label: Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Three
PurchaseObligationDueInThirdYear.description: Amount of purchase arrangement to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Includes, but is not limited to, recorded and unrecorded purchase obligations, long-term purchase commitment, and short-term purchase commitment. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

RefiningAndMarketingCosts.label: Refining and Marketing Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RefiningAndMarketingCosts.description: Cost incurred related to the downstream oil and gas activities, including refining of crude oil and marketing and distribution of crude oil, refined petroleum products, and natural gas.

RefiningAndMarketingRevenue.label: Refining and Marketing Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
RefiningAndMarketingRevenue.description: Revenue related to the downstream oil and gas activities, including the refining of crude oil, as well as the marketing and distribution of crude oil, refined petroleum products, and natural gas.

RepaymentsOfLongTermCapitalLeaseObligati.label: Repayments of Long-term Capital Lease Obligations
RepaymentsOfLongTermCapitalLeaseObligati.description: The cash outflow for the obligation for a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization (with maturities exceeding one year or beyond the operating cycle of the entity, if longer).

RestrictedCashCurrent.label: Restricted Cash, Current
RestrictedCashCurrent.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

ResultsOfOperationsDepreciationDepletion.label: Results of Operations, Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, and Valuation Provisions
ResultsOfOperationsDepreciationDepletion.description: Depreciation, depletion and amortization, and valuation provisions (impairments) related to oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsDryHoleCosts.label: Results of Operations, Dry Hole Costs
ResultsOfOperationsDryHoleCosts.description: Dry hole costs from oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsExplorationExpense.label: Results of Operations, Exploration Expense
ResultsOfOperationsExplorationExpense.description: Exploration costs from oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsImpairmentOfOilAndGas.label: Results of Operations, Impairment of Oil and Gas Properties
ResultsOfOperationsImpairmentOfOilAndGas.description: Costs related to the impairment of oil and gas properties

ResultsOfOperationsIncomeBeforeIncomeTax.label: Results of Operations, Income before Income Taxes
ResultsOfOperationsIncomeBeforeIncomeTax.description: Income before income taxes for oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsIncomeTaxExpense.label: Results of Operations, Income Tax Expense
ResultsOfOperationsIncomeTaxExpense.description: Income tax expense for oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsOilAndGasProducingAct.label: Results of Operations, Oil and Gas Producing Activities Net Income (Excluding Corporate Overhead and Interest Costs)
ResultsOfOperationsOilAndGasProducingAct.description: The results of operations for oil and gas producing activities, excluding corporate overhead and interest costs.

ResultsOfOperationsProductionOrLiftingCo.label: Results of Operations, Production or Lifting Costs
ResultsOfOperationsProductionOrLiftingCo.description: Production (lifting) costs from oil and gas producing activities, including but not limited to lease operating expense, production and ad valorem taxes, and transportation expense.

ResultsOfOperationsRevenueFromOilAndGasP.label: Results of Operations, Revenue from Oil and Gas Producing Activities
ResultsOfOperationsRevenueFromOilAndGasP.description: Total revenues from oil and gas producing activities.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.description: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Including Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.description: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomer.label: Revenue Not from Contract with Customer
RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomer.description: Amount of revenue that is not accounted for under Topic 606.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.label: Revisions of Previous Quantity Estimates
RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of revisions of estimated quantity of oil and gas in proved reserves.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Finance Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.label: Sales and Transfers of Oil and Gas Produced, Net of Production Costs
SalesAndTransfersOfOilAndGasProducedNetO.description: Amount of (increase) decrease in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of sales and transfers of oil and gas produced.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expensed and Capitalized, Amount
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of cost expensed and capitalized for award under share-based payment arrangement.

SharesPaidForTaxWithholdingForShareBased.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Shares Withheld for Tax Withholding Obligation
SharesPaidForTaxWithholdingForShareBased.description: Number of shares used to settle grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

ShippingHandlingAndTransportationCosts.label: Shipping, Handling and Transportation Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
ShippingHandlingAndTransportationCosts.description: Cost incurred during the reporting period in transporting goods and services to customers. Includes freight-out costs.

ShortTermLeaseCost.label: Short-term Lease, Cost
ShortTermLeaseCost.description: Amount of short-term lease cost, excluding expense for lease with term of one month or less.

SignificantCostsIncurredToAcquireMineral.label: Significant Costs Incurred to Acquire Mineral Interest of Proved Reserves
SignificantCostsIncurredToAcquireMineral.description: Significant costs that have been incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, to acquire mineral interests that have proved reserves.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow of Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Other
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of changes from other sources.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Accretion of Discount
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of accretion of discount for the standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow related to proved oil and gas reserves.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of discounted future accumulated cash inflow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.description: Value of forfeited shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesAcquisition.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesAcquisition.description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period pursuant to acquisitions.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.description: Number of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Restricted Stock Award, Net of Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.description: Number of shares issued during the period related to Restricted Stock Awards, net of any shares forfeited.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards forfeited during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Net of Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period, net of the stock value of such awards forfeited.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateDe.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Change in Tax Rate, Deferred Tax Liability, Income Tax Benefit
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateDe.description: Amount of income tax benefit for remeasurement of deferred tax liability from change in tax rate pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommod.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives and Commodity Contracts
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommod.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open derivatives, commodity, or energy contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WorkersCompensationLiabilityCurrentAndNo.label: Workers' Compensation Liability
WorkersCompensationLiabilityCurrentAndNo.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations and payables pertaining to claims incurred of a workers compensation nature.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Dividends Payable
DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding.

Goodwill.label: Goodwill
Goodwill.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.description: Number, after forfeiture, of shares or units issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes shares or units issued under employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).
